header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Balanceability, succeeding at something, assessments, homeschooling, a school friendâ€™s new house being renovated, swimming pools, manmade waterfall, the dangers of diving into water, conversations at school, cats and National Cat Day in Japan, good food combinations, pizza
header.activity: Family talking about Balanceability and things at school
